text: Va agar [Alloh taolo] ʙaroi mardum, ʙadiro ʙo hamon şitoʙ mexost, ki onon nekiro mexohand [va nafrinhoe, ki dar haqqi xud va amvolu farzandonaşon mekunand, mustaçoʙ mekard], hatman, açalaşon faro rasida ʙud. Pas, kasonero ki ʙa didori Mo umed [-u ʙovar] nadorand, vomeguzorem, to dar [gumrohī va] sarkaşijaşon sargardon ʙimonand
